snippet.title: Brick Breaker Lab Android Gameplay ᴴᴰ
snippet.description:
HandyBot by PlayWay SA . (ANDROID/iOS/iphone/ipad)


Save the laboratory from the Artificial Intelligence gone crazy. Destroy the hazardous bricks and take back control of the lab in this super fun arkanoid-style brick breaker.

Shoot the ball around the room to break bricks and clear the level. Use powerful boosters such as gun, wrecking ball, fireball and others to break your way through dozens of fun and challenging levels, different types of bricks and level modes. 

Perform crazy shots to destroy multiple bricks at once and score bonus points like a true brick breaker hero. Connect with Facebook to see your friends’ scores and get free lives!

FEATURES:
● easy to play, but challenging to master
● exploding bricks, moving bricks, fading bricks and other fun obstacles
● powerful boosters for extra damage and bonus points
● combo bonuses for crazy shots and multiple bricks destroyed
● loads of exciting and unique levels
● cool effects for extra addictive arkanoid vibe
● no internet connection required to play

Brick Lab is completely free to play but some optional in-game virtual items will require payment with real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Arkanoid has never been this fun before. Be a brick breaker hero and start this brick breaking saga now!

Google Play download URL:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.epiximus.bricklab&hl=en



Thanks for every Like and Favorite! They really help!
